issue.message: This call is to a method from API 21, the call containing class com.example.android.support.text.emoji.ConfigLayout is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 21. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(21) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(21).
